name: Bömberbots
description:
Bömberbots is a take on the classic Bomberman game. In this 2-4 player local-multiplayer game, the player's objective is to be the last person standing by eliminating the other players by placing bombs. Gather power-ups to enhance your strength and increase your chance of winning against your opponents. 

ControlsKeyboardControllerMovementWASD Left-Stick / D-PadBomb PlacementSpacebarA-ButtonToggle-FullscreenF11

Made using the Löve2D Framework.
